meanings.definition: A type of dinosaur that lived during the Triassic period.
meanings.sent1: The prosauropod roamed the land millions of years ago.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the fossils of prosauropods to learn about ancient creatures.
meanings.sent3: The prosauropod decided to throw a party for all its dinosaur friends.
meanings.sent4: The prosauropod stood tall like a prehistoric giant in the ancient world.
meanings.sent5: Children love to imagine encountering a prosauropod in a time machine adventure.

meanings.definition: A large, herbivorous reptile with a long neck and tail.
meanings.sent1: The prosauropod grazed peacefully in the lush prehistoric forests.
meanings.sent2: Many prosauropods had impressive necks that helped them reach high leaves.
meanings.sent3: The prosauropod tried to wear a scarf but realized its neck was too long.
meanings.sent4: The prosauropod's tail swayed gracefully as it moved through the ancient landscape.
meanings.sent5: The prosauropod's long neck made it stand out among other dinosaurs.

meanings.definition: An extinct group of early dinosaurs.
meanings.sent1: Paleontologists have discovered fossils of the prosauropod group.
meanings.sent2: The prosauropod was one of the first dinosaurs to walk the Earth.
meanings.sent3: The prosauropod group had a reunion in the Jurassic Park movie.
meanings.sent4: The prosauropod's extinction marked the end of an era in dinosaur history.
meanings.sent5: The prosauropod group left a lasting legacy in the world of paleontology.
